Austin Stine's Portfolio

About Me

Developer & Designer Based Out Of Grand Rapids

Hi. My name is Austin, and that's my man Koko. Together, we are not your average junior front-end developers. I love to build web applications that improve the lives of those around me, and I happen to make them look cool too!

Before starting my amazing journey into application development. I have held titles that have ranged from Digital Marketing Manager to the Department Head of Market Analytics at a supply chain organization. I have always been fascinated with software and web applications that help enable everyday life. I find it amazing that as technology continues to advance, so does cultural integration locally, nationally and globally.

That is my dream... I want to be apart of the innovators that see what the world could be tomorrow, instead of what the world is today. Those that are committed to finding fragmentation in not only everyday life but corporate enterprise. My dream is to be apart of the disrupters that are driven to build a better tomorrow.

I currently work with HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript, and have been refining my knowledge on React & React Native. I also have experience in utilizing REST API's, NODE.js and Web Authorization services. As of right now, my abilities focus primarly on front-end development. However, my goal is to expand heavily into the backend, and server world through PHP and Java.

Services

Design

From initial brainstorming to application wireframing, user experience is always on the forefront of my mind. I focus on building user interfaces that are not only visually stunning but also provoide an eassier experience for any target audience. I build easy to use applications by following industry leading UI & eUX design principles.

Development

This is where the magic happens. From initial concept and wireframing, I love coding applications from the ground up. I focus on utilzing HTML, CSS, Javascript, React & Jquery. I also have experience in using Node.JS, WebAuth and REST API's. In the future, my goal is to get familiar with Java, and PHP for more backend, and server development.

WordPress Consulting

I will help you every step of the way. From choosing a domain name, hosting of your new site, site planning (the look of the site and the functionality) through development and launching. Once your site is “live” I can provide on-going maintenance and support. I help people with every aspect of site development.
